programme.title: Hurricanes 1992
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke's recollection of the 1938 New England hurricane.
programme.medium_synopsis: Remembering his time aboard a ship travelling in extreme weather conditions from England to New York, Alistair Cooke anticipates the beginning of the 1992 hurricane season.
